Backpropagation

Forward propagation
 ℎ 1 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 0 +𝑏 𝑥 1 +𝑐 
 ℎ 2 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 1 +𝑏 𝑥 2 +𝑐

 𝑦 3 =𝑑 ℎ 3 +𝑒                        

Backpropagation

content after edit:
Forward propagation
 h₁ = tanh(a h₀ + b x₁ + c) 
 h₂ = tanh(a h₁ + b x₂ + c) 
 h₃ = tanh(a h₂ + b x₃ + c) 
 y₃ = d h₃ + e

Backpropagation
Let f = y₃ 
 ∂f/∂h₁ = ∂h₂/∂h₁ × ∂f/∂h₂

Forward propagation
 ℎ 1 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 0 +𝑏 𝑥 1 +𝑐 
 ℎ 2 =tanh 𝑎 ℎ 1 +𝑏 𝑥 2 +𝑐 
 ℎ 3 = tanh  𝑎 ℎ 2 +𝑏 𝑥 3 +𝑐  
 𝑦 3 =𝑑 ℎ 3 +𝑒                        

Backpropagation
Let 𝑓= 𝑦 3  
 𝑑𝑓 𝑑 ℎ 1  = 𝑑 ℎ 2  𝑑 ℎ 1  × 𝑑𝑓 𝑑 ℎ 2
content after edit:
Forward propagation
 h₁ = tanh(a h₀ + b x₁ + c) 
 h₂ = tanh(a h₁ + b x₂ + c) 
 h₃ = tanh(a h₂ + b x₃ + c) 
 y₃ = d h₃ + e

Backpropagation
Let f = y₃ 
 ∂f/∂h₁ = ∂h₂/∂h₁ × ∂f/∂h₂
